diff_analysis.evidence: The OLD code lacks the newly added util.setPath, util.getPath, and util.deletePath helpers, which in the NEW code are explicitly documented as potentially exposing a prototype pollution issue if used with unsafe input. Their absence in the OLD code means any equivalent path-setting logic elsewhere was likely ad hoc and unguarded, making the OLD version susceptible to prototype pollution (CWE-1321) when handling attacker-controlled object paths.
